web.name: Satya Nadella - Wikipedia
web.description: Nadella attended the Hyderabad Public School, Begumpet [18] before receiving a bachelor's degree in electrical engineering from the Manipal Institute of Technology in Karnataka in 1988.

web.name: Satya Nadella | Biography & Facts | Britannica
web.description: Feb. 17, 2024, 2:44 AM ET (MSN) Satya Nadella (born August 19, 1967, Hyderabad, India) Indian-born business executive who was CEO of the computer software company Microsoft (2014– ). Nadella grew up in the southern Indian city of Hyderabad and studied electrical engineering at Mangalore University (B.Sc., 1988).

web.name: Satya Nadella’s Education Journey From Manipal to Microsoft’s CEO
web.description: Learn how Satya Nadella, the CEO of Microsoft, completed his education at Manipal Institute of Technology, University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee, and University of Chicago. Find out his achievements, challenges, and insights in the tech industry.

web.name: Satya Nadella Biography: The Man Behind Microsoft's Success - EDUCBA
web.description: Early Life and Education. Satya Narayana Nadella was born into a middle-class family in Hyderabad, India, on August 19, 1967. Growing up in Hyderabad, Nadella attended Hyderabad Public School, Begumpet, where he displayed a keen intellect and a passion for learning from a young age.

entities.name: Satya Nadella
entities.description: Satya Narayana Nadella is an Indian-American business executive. He is the executive chairman and CEO of Microsoft, succeeding Steve Ballmer in 2014 as CEO and John W. Thompson in 2021 as chairman. Before becoming CEO, he was the executive vice president of Microsoft's cloud and enterprise group, responsible for building and running the company's computing platforms.
